attributes.review: The single worst app I’ve ever gotten. Nothing more than an ignorant Cheeto who throws tantrums when someone doesn’t agree

attributes.title: Sad Excuse Of A President 🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️
attributes.review: I guess we have to deal with this pedo for a little more but we’re not going down without a fight 😊

attributes.title: very offensive
attributes.review: the entire app is very offensive. when i opened the app, there was a very large cheeto on the front raising its 😡✊ fist at everyone who opens! also, the animal was wearing a blonde wig, which is definitely catfishing!! i do not recommend, this app is definitely only meant for the orange cheetos of this nation!

attributes.title: This app is Donald Trump’s nudes.
attributes.review: I saw Donald’s shrimp. Can’t unsee it. My house blew up because of the 1000 notifications I got per second from this app. No❤️

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever when I opened the app I was greeted with awful pictures

attributes.title: selling my information???
attributes.review: i opened up the app to support our president, but it seems like it’s stealing my information????? i have a theory that he’s stealing our information and sending it to russia/china, so definitely watch out!! i’d rate 0 stars if i could!!!!

attributes.title: Dumb
attributes.review: When I opened the app there was a Cheeto with a wig on waving no amused and it would not let me sign in😗like tf child anyway so that’s my review

attributes.title: I love trump.. but no❤️
attributes.review: Trump is great and all, but I opened the app to find a Cheeto working out (apparently that’s common on here) and then a picture of joe Biden getting laid like.. tf

attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: Why is there a Cheeto in all the pictures???

attributes.title: Why does this exist???
attributes.review: Okay this app is literally pointless only because of Trump. Like Barack Obama should’ve stayed. I hope this app gets DELETED!! BLM ❤️
